definitions.definition: One who is sent on a mission .
A person who travels attempting to spread a religion or creed (Particularly used in context of Christianity).
examples: A missionary was just trying to convert me to his religion.

definitions.definition: The missionary position for sexual intercourse .
examples: My boyfriend only cums during missionary .

definitions.definition: Sexual intercourse in the missionary position .

main_definition: One who is sent on a mission .
secondary_definitions: ( religion ) A person who travels attempting to spread a religion or creed (Particularly used in context of Christianity).
( uncountable ) The missionary position for sexual intercourse .
( uncountable , slang ) Sexual intercourse in the missionary position .
